products.name: Coconut Water
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Beverages,Plant-based beverages,Coconut waters
products.labels: Certified B Corporation,FSC Mix,Vegan Society,Dairy-free,Gluten free, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Coconut water is a natural beverage harvested from young green coconuts, typically containing around 95% water.","It is rich in electrolytes such as potassium, sodium, and magnesium, making it a popular hydration choice post-exercise.","Coconut water is often packaged in eco-friendly materials, such as Tetra Paks, which are recyclable and reduce the carbon footprint compared to glass or plastic bottles.","The quality of coconut water can vary based on the source and processing methods, with fresh, minimally processed options generally offering the best taste and nutritional benefits."]

products.name: Almonds
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Nuts and their products, Nuts, Almonds, pt:Frutos secos
products.facts: ["Almonds are a rich source of vitamin E, magnesium, and fiber.","Almond trees require a Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.","California produces over 80% of the world's almonds, making it a significant agricultural product.","Almonds have a low glycemic index, making them a healthy snack option for maintaining blood sugar levels."]
